author: linconvidal
title: CardanoRio 2022: Hybrid event
description: In Brazil, there is a lack of blockchain events (especially Cardano), which has been further intensified during the COVID-19 pandemic.
solution: A hybrid event to promote and discuss Brazilian projects related to Cardano and connect the community in Brazil.
experience: Our team has experience in organizing mid-size events. We have a good local networking to execute and promote the event.
